data.title: American Ballet Theatre Studio Company
data.meta_description: “It’s heartening to see that the state of classical ballet is strong and there are many talented young dancers being nurtured to take their places in the top companies of […]
data.text:
“It’s heartening to see that the state of classical ballet is strong and there are many talented young dancers being nurtured to take their places in the top companies of the world.”—Bachtrack

ABT Studio Company, the junior company of American Ballet Theatre, is made up of 12-18 rising stars of the ballet world between the ages of 17 and 21. The company prepares these outstanding young dancers, who hail from all over the globe, to enter American Ballet Theatre or other leading ballet companies worldwide. They perform masterworks from the classical and neoclassical canons alongside contemporary works and new commissions by a wide variety of choreographers. This exciting young ensemble showcases the vitality and hopefulness of the next generation of ballet dancers.
